posts.title: Seeking career guidance
posts.body: I’ve completed my bachelor in Computer Science Engineering. I want to get into Artificial Intelligence and machine learning, but I have no idea on where to start. I would appreciate any working professionals in the field of Software Engineering to provide me guidance to get started.

posts.title: Looking for native English speaker
posts.body: I want to learn to communicate in English but I’m not a native English speaker. I am looking for someone with whom I can converse with me at least once every week and help me gain confidence in my spoken English.
